name: Bravo Studio Blocks - Fitness app
description:
Bravo Block for a fitness app: get inspiration or use every card or frame you want when building your own app with Bravo Studio! 

If you're new or learning how to use Bravo Tags, you can see how they're implemented in my designs. We're all part of this amazing journey!

Use these Bravo Blocks to test a real native app or use the templates to build your own and connect it with real, live data!

Hope you like it! 🎉

--

With Bravo Blocks, designing apps just got a WHOLE lot easier with ready-made intro pages, menus, containers, top bars and more 🤓

Check out Bravo Studio App 👏
www.bravostudio.app
